Structs/RangeSlider.html.name: RangeSlider
Structs/RangeSlider.html.abstract: RangeUISlider SwiftUI implementation using UIViewRepresentable. It exposes all the RangeUIslider properties.

Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.name: rangeChangeStarted()
Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.abstract: Calls the delegate when the user has started the change of the range.

Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.name: rangeIsChanging(event:)
Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.abstract: Calls the delegate when the user is changing the range by moving the knobs.

Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.name: rangeChangeFinished(event:)
Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html#/c:.abstract: Calls the delegate when the user has finished the change of the range.

Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html.name: RangeUISliderDelegate
Protocols/RangeUISliderDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol used delegate the read of the RangeUISlider data. Multiple RangeUISlider instance could use the same delegate.

Classes/Bar.html.name: Bar
